eu.mapperproject.jmml.util.graph
Class GraphDecorator<T,E extends Edge<T>>

java.lang.Object
  eu.mapperproject.jmml.util.graph.GraphDecorator<T,E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Categorizer<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CouplingTopologyDecorator, DomainDecorator, TaskGraphDecorator
public abstract class GraphDecorator<T,E extends Edge<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Categorizer<T>

An interface for a class that can decorate nodes and edges

Author:
Joris Borgdorff

public final boolean isDirected()
Whether the output graph will be directed.

decorateNode

public abstract StyledNode decorateNode(T node)
Decorate given node to a StyledNode. May throw a NullPointerException if the given node is null.

Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if the given node is null

decorateEdge

public StyledEdge decorateEdge(E edge,
                               java.util.Map<T,StyledNode> nodes)
Decorate given edge to a StyledEdge. A map of nodes may be supplied which contains all converted from and to nodes.

Parameters:
edge - edge to convert to StyledEdge
nodes - a map of previously instantiated nodes, null if not used
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if given edge is null

addSinkEdge

public StyledEdge addSinkEdge(T node,
                              StyledNode snode)
Create a StyledEdge from given node to the sink node, if applicable.

Parameters:
node - node which needs an edge to a sink
snode - StyledNode version of the same node
Returns:
StyledEdge if node needs sink, null otherwise

addSourceEdge

public StyledEdge addSourceEdge(T node,
                                StyledNode snode)
Create a StyledEdge from the source node to given node, if applicable.

Parameters:
node - node which needs an edge to a sink
snode - StyledNode version of the same node
Returns:
StyledEdge if node needs source, null otherwise

decorateMissingNode

public StyledNode decorateMissingNode(T node)
Create a StyledEdge from the source node to given node, if applicable.

Parameters:
node - node which needs an edge to a sink
snode - StyledNode version of the same node
Returns:
StyledEdge if node needs source, null otherwise
